nodes.text: Veer was a male Ithorian, who lived during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

Veer owned and piloted a cruise ship named the Luxury, which he would hire out. During the Clone Wars, it was hired by the Sentient Beings Opposing Violence and Veer flew the ship to the Cularin system, where the SBOV was holding a peace conference with the Jedi Order. However, the Dark Jedi Raik Muun attacked the ship during the conference. She tied Veer to his chair with spacer's tape.
